key.name: hide-shredding
key.description: Whether to hide shredding. This is done by overwriting the file(s) with zeros.

key.name: remove-file
key.description: Whether to remove the file after shredding it.

key.name: number-of-passes
key.description: How many times the file will be overwritten with random data.

key.name: remove-method
key.description: How the obfucticated file will be removed from the filesystem.

key.name: override-permissions
key.description: If you do not have the neccessary permissions, override them.

key.name: do-not-round-to-next-block
key.summary: Do not round to next block
key.description: Do not round the file to the next block. This is the default for non-regular files.

key.name: number-of-bytes-to-shred
key.summary: Number of bytes to shred entry
key.description: Shred the number of bytes you want, and leave the rest of the file untouched.

key.name: shred-executable
key.description: The path to the shred executable.

key.name: overwrite-data-file
key.description: Where to get data to overwrite the to-be-shredded files.
